title: Support
body: I cannot log in Support anymore!

replies.body: What link are you using to get to the support site?  It looks like you're able to login to the boards, so everything looks okay.  If you have any issues logging in, try our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) steps to update your information.  I hope that helps!

Hi Porocles, I know it's a bit unusual for someone else to step in and try and give the answers to your questions here, but I've been trying to help Picanha out via another [thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/1lf3T4ij-fair-trial?comment=000200000000) for a few days and there was a bit of confusion over there as well. 

Background:
-The issue he had was with the EUNE boards, where he was suspended, and he tried to log in to support to submit a ticket regarding that, but was unable to do so. 
-He came here and posted about the problem asking for help, but was told that unfortunately, we cannot really "fix" matters, and that it must be handled by support. 

Steps Taken: 
-He has gone through the account recovery steps you suggested as far as recovering username and password, but when trying to submit a ticket, it automatically shows him the "you have been logged out" screen and doesn't let him log in.  
- I've asked him to try it using a different browser, and to try the same browser after a short delay to see if it was a temporary issue with the ISP. Still unable to log in.
-Other family members with League accounts that use the computer are able to log into player support.

He has been trying for days now to log in to player support, but can't seem to do so.  I hope this gives a bit of clarification on what he's tried, and maybe you can give some insight on what he needs to do next.  He's been trying to do the last step on account recovery, but can't log in to support to submit the ticket!

I am trying to submit a ticket again through the account recovery form but above the subject line there is a red box reading
Requester: Picanha96 is suspended.

I cannot log in Support specifically any more that is happening last 2-3 months.
I can continue to play the game and use the boards.

Did you receive a reply when you submitted an email to support@riotgames.com?  Perhaps you can take a screenshot of what you are seeing when you try to submit the ticket and either post it here for Porocles to see (with any personal identifying information blacked out for safety) or include that with your email to support?
I cannot post my picture...
Why not?
They do not accept jpg as attachments. Actually I do not know how to upload any attachments...

There are many free and safe image hosting sites where you can upload an image, and it will give you a link.  You can then post the link in the body of the email, or in your reply here to Porocles if you feel comfortable posting it here on the boards.  But again, be aware that if you post it here, it will be visible to anyone who reads the boards.

As far as image hosting sites, I personally use either Photobucket or Imgur, and have never had any problems with either.

[http://s346.photobucket.com/user/George_Ntoulos/media/Requester_zpsejqkx3oi.jpg.html?filters[user]=146111905&filters[recent]=1&sort=1&o=0](http://s346.photobucket.com/user/George_Ntoulos/media/Requester_zpsejqkx3oi.jpg.html?filters[user]=146111905&filters[recent]=1&sort=1&o=0)

As adviced!

I'm sure he's not ignoring you.  It's more likely that since your post is older, it's no longer on the front page of the Support Board when he comes in to look for the recent posts.  

What did support@riotgames.com tell you when you sent them the screenshot?

They did not even reply!
Did you check your spam/junk folder in case the email was sent there by mistake?

> [{quoted}](name=VentressRedeemed,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=65kAF5qk,comment-id=000000010000000000010000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-29T23:55:16.906+0000)

> Did you check your spam/junk folder in case the email was sent there by mistake?

Always!

Hmmm, well, if you emailed them last week when you posted that picture and they still haven't replied, maybe they didn't get your email.  You might want to try emailing them again.   But if you only emailed them a day or two ago, try to give them a little longer, as it can take them a couple days to look into the issue and see what is going on.

> [{quoted}](name=VentressRedeemed,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=65kAF5qk,comment-id=00000001000000000001000000000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-30T00:24:42.731+0000)

Help me please do not forsake me!

> [{quoted}](name=VentressRedeemed,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=65kAF5qk,comment-id=00000001000000000001000000000000000100000000000000020000,timestamp=2017-02-26T17:34:38.558+0000)
>
> I'm sorry it took me so long to respond to you, I was very sick and off the boards for a few weeks.  I'm not sure why you aren't getting a reply from the support email.  At this point, this thread has been buried pretty far back in this section of the board.  You might want to consider making a new thread?  I know they usually frown upon people making new ones on the same topic, but it seems like you are having two issues now: 1. you cannot log into support and 2. you get no reply after emailing support multiple times. At this point, I think only a Rioter will be able to help, and they may not be able to see this thread with it being pushed so far back.  I honestly don't know why they haven't replied to you at the email.  I can understand it taking a few days, or even a week maybe, but it's been a month.  You should have heard something by now.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Gy2UiUI2-support-attention-porocles

I'm sorry it took me so long to respond to you, I was very sick and off the boards for a few weeks.  I'm not sure why you aren't getting a reply from the support email.  At this point, this thread has been buried pretty far back in this section of the board.  You might want to consider making a new thread? At this point, I think only a Rioter will be able to help, and they may not be able to see this thread with it being pushed so far back.  I honestly don't know why they haven't replied to you at the email.  I can understand it taking a few days, or even a week maybe, but it's been a month.  You should have heard something by now.

Hopefully Porocles will have some ideas.  Did you email the link to the email address that he listed?
The screenshot is from that form.
Okay, great!  I hope they can get you fixed up soon.

> [{quoted}](name=VentressRedeemed,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=65kAF5qk,comment-id=000000010000000000010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-24T00:47:10.059+0000)
>
> Okay, great!  I hope they can get you fixed up soon.

Figures he ignores me now...
If I support the lack of anonymity I shouldn't black out any information.

Well, it's up to you how much you want to post about yourself here.  But if that form shows a field for your username and/or email address, posting that might open you up to being easier to hack.  Which could in turn get your account stolen, and potentially banned if the hacker breaks the rules while using it.  So, you really might want to consider at least blurring out those details before posting it publicly.  It's perfectly fine to leave them there when sending a screenshot to Riot Support via the support email, as it can help them figure out what problem you are having, and they certainly are not going to misuse your information.  But I wouldn't necessarily show it to everyone that reads the forums...

We were unable to connect to the support site. Wait a minute or so before trying again.


When I sign in the to Support I get those in this sequence.

Thank you for those details, VentressRedeemed!  Picanha96, are you able to submit a ticket through our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)?  It does not require logging in, and acts as a webform which you should be able to submit.  You can also send an email to support@riotgames.com.  Let me know if that helps.
